name: C. Circular Local MiniMax
statement:
You are given n integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n. Is it possible to arrange them on a circle so that each
number is strictly greater than both its neighbors or strictly smaller
than both its neighbors?In other words, check if there exists a
rearrangement b_1, b_2,
ldots, b_n of the integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n such that for each i from 1 to n at least one of the
following conditions holds: b_{i-1} < b_i > b_{i+1} b_{i-1} > b_i <
b_{i+1}To make sense of the previous formulas for i=1 and i=n, one shall
define b_0=b_n and b_{n+1}=b_1.
